item.title: Experienced Youtube Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced Youtube Video Editor to join our team. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in editing and producing high-quality videos for Youtube channels. Your main responsibilities will include editing raw footage, adding music and sound effects, creating engaging transitions, and incorporating visual effects as needed. The videos will cover a variety of topics, so versatility and creativity are essential. You should also have a good understanding of Youtube best practices, including optimizing videos for SEO and engagement.

Skills required:
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g. Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong attention to detail
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
- Excellent communication skills

Size: Medium
Duration: 1 to 3 months
Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 22, 2024 18:09 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States

item.title: Short-form news content needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video producer/editor to help us reopen production with a news content creation project. The videos are in short form (under a minute in length) and have no voiceovers (only subtitles). We will provide the scripts, you will have to produce the videos with content based on the scripts. We would prefer a Spanish and English-speaking freelancer as we would like the videos to be produced in both languages. Please take a look at the example video I have attached for reference. A bonus would be if you have a team of people that could help out as well as we are looking to scale production quite rapidly.

item.title: Video Editor Needed for Fitness App Content Creation - Upwork
item.description:
Description:

We are developing a dynamic fitness app and are in need of an experienced video editor who can segment workout videos into smaller, digestible clips. These clips will be integrated into our app to guide users through various exercises and routines. Knowledge and understanding of fitness exercises, martial arts, and kickboxing are highly advantageous for this role.

Responsibilities:

Segmentation of Workout Videos: Break down long workout sessions into smaller clips based on specific exercises or sets. Each clip must be edited to start and end cleanly, ensuring a seamless user experience.

Labeling and Categorization: Label each clip appropriately based on the exercise demonstrated and its difficulty level. Categorization must align with the app’s structure and user navigation.

Quality Control: Ensure each video clip maintains high visual and audio quality, with proper alignment of voiceovers and demonstrations if needed.

Requirements:

Proven experience with video editing, particularly in cutting and preparing content for digital platforms.
Strong understanding of fitness routines and exercises; familiarity with martial arts and kickboxing is a significant plus.
Ability to work independently and efficiently, adhering to project timelines and specifications.
Excellent organizational skills to manage multiple clips and ensure consistency across the content.
Please apply with your portfolio that includes examples of previous work related to fitness or sports editing. Include your rates and availability as well.

We look forward to finding a great match for our project and creating engaging content for our fitness app users!



Hourly Range: $3.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 17:56 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Live Action Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Live Action Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Help with SaaS demo video - Upwork
item.description:
I created a demo video of our software, but I'd like help polishing the project and ideally turning it into two separate videos. 1 video where it is a 30-60 second teaser video and one video that is a 3-4 minute introductory video.

Here's the first iteration of the video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9EPLtf9nj7A

I have recordings of each clip, and I can re-record them as well.

The feedback I'm trying to address with the polish to the video it is too jammed in a short period, it doesn't highlight enough of the pain we're addressing, and the text + video at the same time is hard to follow.

Budget: $1,000

item.title: Expert Video Editor - Legal Niche - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for an EXPERT video editor to help me edit my videos that are informational videos on various insurance topics. I already have the scripts and voice overs and am only looking for a quality experienced editor to help me put it all together. You will be expected to find copyright free clips online and follow all copyright rules to ensure the video is claim free. I am looking for ONLY an experienced editor who is confident they can do this style and make the video look as professional as possible. We will be paying $5/ min of edit with most videos being 5-10 mins long and this will be a long term relationship/ project. I will be asking for a 30 second - 1 min sample from all editors to ensure we are not wasting each others time. Raises and bonuses will be awarded overtime and will be performance based. Thank you and have an amazing day!

Edit style like this:
https://youtu.be/g8Nar1s5UgM?si=0Fg-AOKujn1Xv0Be

Hourly Range: $44.00-$66.00

item.title: Need UGC style TikTok "Get ready with me as we pack" video - Upwork
item.description:
Please provide your flat rate quote for this video.

We are having a motivational, not for profit teen event for mental health awareness, body positivity and inclusivity for a group of Gen Z's.

We have tried to keep our hype and campaign videos on target for our audience by making modern applications of tiktok trends etc.

We are looking for a "get ready with me as we pack" style video to post on our social media channel to have someone packing a suitcase or duffel back for the event.

The purpose of this is to give a modern take on a "what to pack" list so the attendees know what they need to bring.

I'd imagine it will be pretty short - maybe a min or so?

We are open to selfie style video or first person view but we'd like the ASMR kind of vibe you get in tiktok "restocking" videos

Overall we need great energym familiar tiktok trend vibes and a modern look and feel so it feels right off of a popular tiktok influencer's profile.

See this example:

https://www.tiktok.com/@_catben_/video/7374478991446560043?lang=en&q=get%20ready%20with%20me%20as%20we%20pack%20for&t=1719077359560


Posted On: June 22, 2024 17:31 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Social Media Advertising
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Social Media Advertising
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Rockstar Video Editor for YouTube Videos and Shorts - Upwork
item.description:
Howdy Upwork Freelancers:

I'm looking for a rockstar video editor to take my videos and make them look awesome.   My channel is about E-Commerce and you can see some examples at https://www.youtube.com/@E-BusinessOnline

My videos are mostly training and discussing news, strategies, and topics about e-commerce.   I already have a good quality audio mic, so you should not need a lot of audio editing.

I'd like to break up my videos so they aren't so much of me in front of the camera.  I'd like to add more:
1 - graphics
2 - call outs, text amplifiers
3 - royalty free B-Roll and Graphics (strict here that it be royalty free)
4 - video cuts/edits if I make a mistake during my video, instead of starting over, I'll just say something like "cut, let me start that part over again", and allow you to edit as needed.

I currently have a "Headliner" account that can be utilized to easily make shorts, etc, or you can make the shorts yourself.

I will send examples of channels that I really like once you are selected as a finalist.

I'm open to hourly or a fixed price per video, or more preferable, a fixed rate per month based on a specified number of videos or hours per month.

MOST IMPORTANT TO ME:
How fast are you?   If I send you an unedited video, can you have it complete and uploaded within 24-48 hours?

MAKE IT ENGAGING!

TO APPLY:
1 - No Pakistan applications accepted
2 - Send links to at least 3 YouTube Videos you have edited.
3 - Send list of software/tools you utlize.
4  - Send any references who are willing to discuss your work.
5 - Tell me who your favorite sports team is!


Posted On: June 22, 2024 17:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Content Manager (iPhone & Mac Required) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a dedicated Social Media Content Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate must possess the following:

1. Devices:
   - iPhone 11 or newer (this must be a separate device, not your personal phone; if you perform well with one device, we will provide additional devices and increase your salary and hours)
   - MacBook or iMac
   - CapCut app installed

2. Responsibilities:
   - Post daily Instagram reels and TikTok slideshows on various accounts following a detailed plan.


3. Requirements:
   - Located in Austria or Germany.
   - Reliable, responsible, and trustworthy.
   - Experience in video editing and marketing is welcome but not mandatory.

If you meet these criteria and are eager to contribute to our growing team, we would love to hear from you!

item.title: Video Tutorial Creator for YouTube - Upwork
item.description:
Calling all Midjourney and Gen AI image creators!

We are looking for a talented Midjourney teacher who can create engaging and informative video tutorials for our YouTube channel (https://www.youtube.com/@aievolved) As a video tutorial creator, your primary responsibility will be to develop high-quality instructional content on Midjourney topics that will be used across our channel and lead into our cohort courses.

You will need to effectively explain concepts, demonstrate techniques, and provide step-by-step guidance in a clear and concise manner. To apply please add the answer to 2 * 3 in the opening line. The videos will be edited and published on our YouTube channel to educate and inspire our audience.

    Skills required:
    - Proficient in Midjourney
    - Strong English and communication skills
    - Ability to break down complex topics into easily understandable segments
    - Basic video screen recording skills using tools like Loom

To apply please forward some links of you teaching or on camera in some form. No worries if this is not Midjourney related at this point. Please also share some of your Midjourney portfolio. This is essential in order for your application to be considered.

This is a new and exciting role as we look to professionalize our channel and increase our reach. We are attempting to build a Gen AI tutorial team and are looking for not just skilled people to work with, but also people with personality and character who are team minded. If this sounds like you, we can't wait to hear from you.

Thanks for reading this far and I look forward to receiving your app.
Utkarsh & Vay
Team AIE

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00

item.ns0:encoded:
Calling all Midjourney and Gen AI image creators!

We are looking for a talented Midjourney teacher who can create engaging and informative video tutorials for our YouTube channel (https://www.youtube.com/@aievolved) As a video tutorial creator, your primary responsibility will be to develop high-quality instructional content on Midjourney topics that will be used across our channel and lead into our cohort courses.

You will need to effectively explain concepts, demonstrate techniques, and provide step-by-step guidance in a clear and concise manner. To apply please add the answer to 2 * 3 in the opening line. The videos will be edited and published on our YouTube channel to educate and inspire our audience.

    Skills required:
    - Proficient in Midjourney
    - Strong English and communication skills
    - Ability to break down complex topics into easily understandable segments
    - Basic video screen recording skills using tools like Loom

To apply please forward some links of you teaching or on camera in some form. No worries if this is not Midjourney related at this point. Please also share some of your Midjourney portfolio. This is essential in order for your application to be considered.

This is a new and exciting role as we look to professionalize our channel and increase our reach. We are attempting to build a Gen AI tutorial team and are looking for not just skilled people to work with, but also people with personality and character who are team minded. If this sounds like you, we can't wait to hear from you.

Thanks for reading this far and I look forward to receiving your app.
Utkarsh & Vay
Team AIE
